synopsis: The little orphan boy Marcelino grows up in a convent and is being raised by the monks. But Marcelino does not know who he really is and how he got into the care of the monks. One day he meets the gypsy girl Candela. She knows a surprisingly alot about Marcelino and tells him his story: On a cold April night a poor woman puts her baby at the gates of a Franciscan monastery...
